thread.title: Excellent romantic getaway
thread.title_full: Excellent romantic getaway - Review of Kimpton Hotel Eventi, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: chobrien5
title: Excellent romantic getaway
text:
A fantastic birthday surprise was had in this wonderful space hidden on 6th avenue between two restaurants. The front desk was fabulous with a special shout out to Celine. She went above and beyond with all she did. The room was awesome with a fantastic view of the Empire State building. Great spot which we'll be sure to come back.
Room Tip: ask for the 6th ave view so you can see the ESB See more room tips
